Content:
Hi I am Michael from the United Kingdom (south), I am a biker through and through and I have been cycling since a youngster, over the last couple of years I have been building my own bicycles and built a Lynskey titanium sportive for my deliveries, and recently purchased a Lexmoto Aura 125cc scooter which I adore.
I have discovered this forum after trouble shooting some issues I have had!, I have also fallen in love with the Indian flat track FTR 1200cc which ticks all my boxes, one issue is who would work with that bike as the dealerships are few and far between where I am! one question I do have is would a Harley Davidson dealership be likely to work on that bike or anyone else as we have a Lind Harley dealership in my hometown?

Title: Hello nice to meet you
